caller_intent: The caller (Abraham Ortiz) wants to add a new company (Athens Steel Building Corporation) to his existing insurance policy under his father's name (Antonio Ortiz) without creating a new policy, likely for side jobs.
resolution_steps: Agent Cody confirmed the policyholder's name (Antonio Ortiz) and primary employer (Carolina Carports).
Verified the policy's renewal date (September 2025) and payroll details.
Confirmed the new company's name and address (Athens Steel Building Corporation, 900 NE Loop 7, Athens, TX 75752).
Obtained the email address (Ortiz121@icloud.com) for sending the certificate of insurance.
Informed the caller the certificate would be sent immediately and would expire on 9/12/25.
knowledge_required: Understanding how to add additional insured parties to existing policies
Access to policy databases for verification
Knowledge of certificate of insurance generation and distribution
summary: Abraham Ortiz requested to add Athens Steel Building Corporation to his father's existing insurance policy. Agent Cody verified policy details, confirmed company information, and arranged for a certificate of insurance to be emailed. The call concluded with the certificate being sent and the customer instructed to check his email.
